DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to observe the ventilatory and cardiac function (included the pulmonary arterial pressure) during an intermittent work exercise test with high density work load.
DOC.brief_title: Interest of a 30 Minutes' Intermittent Work Exercise Test in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease: Cardiac and Pulmonary Functions
DOC.criteria: COPD patients (male and female) with moderate obstruction (FEV1/CV<60%) acute respiratory disease any type of cardiac disease
